import {useState} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' export default function ProductCard({categoryName, setLinkBack, ...props}) { const [productCardParams, setProductCardParams] = useState({ picture: props.record.fields.Фото[0].url, name: props.record.fields.Название, addition: props.record.fields.Дополнение, brand: props.record.fields.Бренд, price: props.record.fields.Цена, id: props.record.id }) return (

{productCardParams.name}

{productCardParams.addition}

{productCardParams.price}
) }
